user_question: How can I improve my flexibility to perform a perfect split in 30 days?
final_answer: To improve flexibility for a perfect split in 30 days, follow a daily stretching routine focusing on hamstrings, hip flexors, and groin muscles. Consistency and gradual progression are key.
